1 #include <iostream>
2 #include "ros/ros.h"
3 #include "std_msgs/Bool.h"
4 #include "std_msgs/Float32MultiArray.h"

7 #include "LowLevelControl.h"
8 
9 double LegX, LegY;
10 //double RobotX, RobotY, RobotTheta;
11 bool StartFollow;
12 bool LegsPoseUpdate = false;
13 
14 void callbackLegPose(const geometry_msgs::PointStamped::ConstPtr& msg)
15 {
16  //This topic contains the absolute position of the detected legs. leg_finder node publishes this topic.
17  //An array is used due to the possibility of finding more than one pair of legs.
18  //Header indicates the frame w.r.t the positions are expressed. Use of 'map' frame is preferred.
19  LegX=msg->point.x;
20  LegY=msg->point.y;
21  LegsPoseUpdate = true;
22 }
23 
24 //void callbackCurrentPose(const geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped::ConstPtr& msg)
25 //{
26 // //This topic constains the robot pose w.r.t map. It is published by the localization nod (amcl)
27 //}
28 
29 void callbackStartFollow(const std_msgs::Bool::ConstPtr& msg)
30 {
31  //Signal for starting to follow human
32  if(msg->data)
33  std::cout << "HumanFollower.->Start signal received. " << std::endl;
34  else
35  std::cout << "HumanFollower.->Stop signal received. " << std::endl;
36  StartFollow = msg->data;
37 }
38 
39 
40 int main(int argc, char** argv)
41 {
42  std::cout << "INITIALIZING HUMAN FOLLOWER BY MARCOSOFT..." << std::endl;
43  ros::init(argc, argv, "human_follower");
44  ros::NodeHandle n;
45  ros::Subscriber subLegPose = n.subscribe("/hri/leg_finder/leg_poses", 1, callbackLegPose);
46  ros::Subscriber subStartFollow = n.subscribe("/hri/human_following/start_follow", 1, callbackStartFollow);
47  ros::Publisher pubRobotSpeeds = n.advertise<std_msgs::Float32MultiArray>("/hardware/mobile_base/speeds", 1);
48  ros::Rate loop(10);
49  LowLevelControl lLControl;// = LowLevelControl();
50  std_msgs::Float32MultiArray speeds;
51  speeds.data.push_back(0);
52  speeds.data.push_back(0);
53 
54 
55  while(ros::ok())
56  {
57  if (LegsPoseUpdate && StartFollow)// && ((LegX * LegX) + (LegY*LegY)) > 0.49)
58  {
59  LegsPoseUpdate = false;
60  lLControl.CalculateSpeeds(0.0, 0.0 , 0.0 , (float)LegX , (float)LegY , speeds.data[0], speeds.data[1], false);
61  pubRobotSpeeds.publish(speeds);
62  }
63  ros::spinOnce();
64  loop.sleep();
65  }
66 }
